name: Don't Panic (omer1615, sanemsky)
description:
Inside the core room of a nuclear power plant, Things start to go wrong. You have to complete various tasks to stabilise the nuclear core as fast as you can before the bars reach the top of the room and prevent a nuclear disaster.

Can you act under pressure and keep the core from exploding? 

Whatever you do, DON'T PANIC!

Controls;

WASD - to Move Around

Shift - to run

E - to interact

Mouse - to hold and other various actions

Thank you for playing :)
